docs.title: Welcome to BruinBots!
docs.text:
We are the BruinBots, an FTC robotics team based out of Fairfax, Virginia.

  • Our Robot

    Meet our robot, Jimmy.

  • About Us

    Learn more about our team and what we do.

    Learn More

  • Outreach

    Learn more about our outreach events.

    Learn More

  • Get Started with FTC

    More information about FTC can be found here.

docs.title: About Us
docs.text: We are the Bruinbots #13599, a group made up of 7 team members and 4 team coaches. We compete in the First Tech Challenge! The team is in its 8th season for FTC. We meet for 5 hours a week, 3 hours on Sundays, 2 hours on Tuesdays. We have lots of fun learning new things about building and programming robots. Coming from different schools, our members range from 7th-12th grade. Together we compete as the Bruinbots!
